notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.message: Sorry, the page doesnâ€™t exist. It may have been moved, deleted, or the URL is incorrect. Please check the address and try again or return to the homepage.

infoCard.title: How Are You Feeling Today?
infoCard.description: Create a habit to focus on today and easily track your progress.

errors.startTimeBeforeEndTime: The start time must be set before the end time.
errors.startDateCurrentError: The start date cannot be less than current date.
errors.endDateCurrentError: The end date cannot be less than current date.
errors.habitNameEmpty: The habit name cannot be empty.
errors.invalidStartTime: Please select a valid start time.

createHabit.title: Habit Creation
createHabit.description: Fill out the form to create a new habit.

successNotification.title: Habit Created Successfully
successNotification.description: Your habit has been successfully created.

editHabit.title: Edit Habit
editHabit.description: Change your habit details, update goals.

successNotification.title: Habit Update Successfully
successNotification.description: Your habit has been successfully updated.

confirmHabitStatusChange.title: Change Habit Status
confirmHabitStatusChange.text: Are you sure you want to mark this habit as complete?

success.title: Habit Status Updated
success.description: The habit status has been successfully updated to 'Done'.

unmarkHabitStatus.title: Change Habit Status
unmarkHabitStatus.text: Are you sure you want to unmark this habit?

success.title: Habit Status Updated
success.description: The habit status has been updated to 'Started'.

deleteHabit.title: Delete Habit
deleteHabit.text: Are you sure you want to delete this habit? Deleting it remove all associated habits you have created.

success.title: Habit Deleted
success.description: The habit has been successfully deleted.

enableHabit.title: Enable Habit
enableHabit.text: Are you sure you want to enable this habit? Once enabled, it will be visible again in your active habits.

success.title: Habit Enabled Successfully
success.description: Your habit has been successfully enabled and is now visible in your active habits.

disableHabit.title: Disable Habit
disableHabit.text: Are you sure you want to disable this habit? Once disabled, it will no longer be visible in your active habits list.

success.title: Habit Disabled Successfully
success.description: Your habit has been successfully disabled and is no longer visible in your active habits list.

error.title: Error
error.description: Something went wrong. Please try again.

rangeError.title: Invalid Date Range
rangeError.description: The start date cannot be later than end date.

invalidDateError.title: Invalid Date
invalidDateError.description: The date format is invalid. Please use the format YYYY/MM/dd.

invalidDateRangeError.title: Invalid Date
invalidDateRangeError.description: The date must be within the valid range between {minDate} and {maxDate}.

progress.myProgressDescription: See how much of this habit you have completed.

imagesAlt.closeImg: Icon with two diagonal lines crossing each other, forming a close symbol
imagesAlt.arrowImg: Icon with a simple arrow shape
imagesAlt.homeImg: Icon in the shape of a house
imagesAlt.settingsImg: Icon depicting a gear with toothed edges
imagesAlt.calendarImg: Icon depicting a calendar with boxes for the month and days
imagesAlt.clockImg: Icon depicting a clock with a circular face and hour and minute hands
imagesAlt.unlockImg: Icon depicting an unlocked padlock, with the shackle raised
imagesAlt.lockImg: Icon depicting a locked padlock, with the shackle down

help.welcomeDescription: Here, you'll find instructions on features and functionalities to help you get the most out of Trako.

habitManagement.title: Habit Management
habitManagement.description: Create, edit, delete, enable, and disable habits.

flexibleNavigation.title: Flexible Navigation
flexibleNavigation.description: Navigate habits by date or date range.

repeatingHabits.title: Repeating Habits
repeatingHabits.description: Choose specific days for habit repetition.

habitStatusTracking.title: Habit Status Tracking
habitStatusTracking.description: Monitor the status of your habits (Unfinished, Completed, Expired, Disabled).

progressOverview.title: Progress Overview
progressOverview.description: Track how many habits you've completed.

calendarNavigation.title: Calendar Navigation
calendarNavigation.description: View habits on the calendar with a red dot indicator.

themeCustomization.title: Theme Customization
themeCustomization.description: Switch between dark and light modes.

dateRangeSelection.title: Date Range Selection
dateRangeSelection.description: Set habit start and end dates, with a default of {defaultYearsDuration} years.

routerNavigation.title: Router Navigation
routerNavigation.description: Navigate between habits using a date range. Format: day/YYYY-MM-DD/YYYY-MM-DD or day/YYYY-MM-DD.
